content: Using nm on Windows, I find that libleanshared.dll.a does not contain symbols like lean_alloc_object as the equivalent shared libraries do on Linux or Mac. I am therefore having trouble building a program that depends on the functions from lean.h, even when I use the built-in clang.exe. What might I be doing wrong?
For those experiencing this same issue, itâ€™s in libInit_shared.dll.a
Chase Norman has marked this topic as resolved.
